text:
@RepMattGaetz Absolutely CLINGING to fake patriotism tests now. 

That’s the state of the Republican Party. Pathetic.

They let Russians hunt American soldiers.

They pretend COVID-19 doesn’t exist.

They disrespect our FBI and intelligence agencies.

They hate our powerful, productive cities.
